name: Toxicroak
description: It bounces toward opponents and gouges them with poisonous claws. No more than a scratch is needed to knock out its adversaries.

abilities.name: More Poison
abilities.effect: Put 2 more damage counters on your opponent’s Poisoned Pokémon during Pokémon Checkup.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
